text: Rosângela da Silva (born 27 August 1966), commonly known by her nickname Janja, is a Brazilian sociologist and the current First Lady of Brazil, being married to 35th and the 39th President of Brazil Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva. She was a communications advisor at Eletrobras. ==References== Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:First Ladies of Brazil Category:Brazilian sociologists Category:Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva Category:People from Paraná State
title: Rosângela Lula da Silva
